transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Sir aawaz aa rahi hai?

Customer: Madam dinner evening ko call karo na.

Executive: Ji?

Customer: Haan haan. Theek hai? Haan sir good afternoon sir. Uh, Bhumika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se account manager.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Madam ek minute chalu rakhiye.

Executive: Achha achha.

Customer: Haan chale chale bhaiya.

Customer: Chalte hai, thik se nahi bhai tumne ek paath bhej denge, tumne call aavse, thik se.

Customer: Baat kar lijiye.

Executive: Haan bolo madam.

Executive: Ji. Uh, sir Bhumika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se account manager. Sir jo leads aapko bhej rahe hain, woh sir aap utha rahe hain?

Customer: Hmm. Uthai hui hai.

Executive: Sir aaj wali jo lead bheji sir aapne uthai hai?

Customer: Aaj nahi uthai hai madam, time nahi mila mere ko.

Executive: Achha sir ye GST verified lead thi, bulk order tha. Jo aapne, but sir main yaha pe dekh rahi hu last lead toh aapne 21 tarikh ki uthai hui hai. Uske baad se nahi uthi hai.

Customer: Dekho aaj ki abhi uthi hui dikhegi.

Executive: Haan sir aapne utha liya tha. Udaipur ki. Baaki sir 21 tarikh ko last lead uthai thi. Itne din se beech mein utha nahi rahe the leads.

Customer: Kaam thoda jyada hai madam naukri mein, isliye thoda miss ho jata hai.

Executive: Okay sir.

Executive: Ji. Uh, sir baaki inquiries aur calls ka kuch response batayenge?

Customer: Inquiry toh aap bhej toh rahe ho WhatsApp pe, maine dekha. Lekin

Executive: Sir woh main aapko buyleads share kar rahi hu.

Customer: Haan buyleads share kar rahe ho aap, abhi iska positive way mein apne ko iska response mile. Ek aadha order aaye toh apne ko samajh mein aaye madam.

Executive: Ji woh toh hai sir. Ye sabhi lead abhi utha lete hai.

Executive: Hmm. Sir baaki calls isme aayi hai, do aayi hai, dono aapne miss kari hai. Ek 22 tarikh ko aayi thi. Hmm. Ek 16 tarikh ko aayi thi, dono hi aapne miss kar di sir.

Customer: Haan woh mere end se miss hua hai madam, main us time meeting mein tha isliye.

Executive: Achha. Thik hai sir. Ji.

Executive: Baaki sir jo lead bhejo woh aap please uthaiye. Daily basis pe.

Customer: Woh main abhi clear kar hi raha hu madam. Jo jo lead aayi hui hai.

Executive: Ab sir jaise aapne aap kal maine aapko jo bheji thi woh aap aaj aap uthayenge toh sir woh ab tak toh sold out ho gayi hogi na.

Customer: Thik hai madam real time utha lenge aap. Kyunki thoda kya hai time.

Executive: Haan real time toh hai sir.

Executive: Ji. Thik hai madam real time utha lenge aap.

Executive: Hmm. Sir isiliye aap matlab time ki shortage hai isiliye aapko WhatsApp pe lead share kar rahe hain. Ki aapko aasaani rahe IndiaMART pe na jaana pade WhatsApp pe hi lead utha le.

Customer: Koi baat nahi abhi jaise aati hai madam hum yaha se pick kar lenge.

Executive: Haan sir ab jo main aapko WhatsApp pe daily basis pe bhej rahi hu, aap please unhe na daily uthaiye aur phir aap mujhe bataye kya response mila aapko. Achha milega sir definitely achha milega.

Customer: Bilkul madam.

Executive: Thik hai sir. Ji ji.

Executive: Sir baaki main ye puch rahi thi ki yaha se jo aapne concerned open kiya hua tha not satisfied deke, ise sir main close kar du?

Customer: Sir main aapko jo bhi baat

Executive: Ji sir?

Customer: Bolna toh hai aapko, order aayega toh main close saamne se hi kar dunga. Ki I am satisfied. Please call this, please close this thread. I am, ye matlab service se main khush hu. Thik hai? Main saamne se input de dunga, aapko bolne ki zarurat nahi padegi madam.

Executive: Sir aapne hi concerned open kiya tha not satisfied, sir ye hamare liye hota hai. Ki humne aapko proper service nahi di. Ab sir main aapko daily basis pe leads bhej rahi hu. Toh sir woh open kara hua hai toh sir kya matlab woh hai. Agar main aapko lead nahi bheju aap phir se open kar dijiyega.

Executive: Ji sir?

Customer: Madam pura saal beet gaya hai, pata hai maine paisa invest kiya aapko, ye toh dekh rahe ho na aap?

Executive: But sir dekhiye jab se aapka account mere paas aaya hai, main toh sir aapse

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Sir dekhiye mere paas jab se aapka account aaya hai, main toh koshish hi kar rahi hu sir aapko try karne ki ki aapko kuch business mil jaye.

Executive: Aisa toh hai nahi ki sir main nahi koshish kar rahi hu.

Customer: Thik hai madam, uh, dekh leta hu main. Thik hai abhi thoda time ka abhav hai.

Executive: Hmm. Aur ye lead main sort out kar deta hu. Sir concern close kar du ki nahi?

Customer: Satisfied ka hai madam ye, dekho certification toh nahi mila hai, close karna hai toh kar do, koi issue nahi hai, thik hai. Nahi sir sir aap not satisfied de doge main isliye puch rahi hu aapse.

Customer: Aap bolo toh karu warna nahi karu.

Customer: Aapko karna hai toh close kar do, koi dikkat nahi hai madam, bol toh raha hu main.

Executive: Nahi sir aap matlab aap satisfied doge ya not satisfied doge?

Customer: Mere ko jab ye service se jis ji dekho maine baatein karne ka toh paisa diya nahi hai, woh toh aap bhi mante ho na madam?

Executive: Ji sir.

Customer: Haan baatein karne ka paisa nahi diya hai maine aapki service lene ke liye paisa diya hai aur service mein mere ko abhi tak ek bhi order mila nahi hai. Woh aap bhi check kar pa rahe ho, thik hai?

Executive: Sir aap buyleads toh aap utha nahi rahe the na sir.

Customer: Madam abhi tak dekh lijiye aap last ke jab baat hua tha uske baad kitni lead maine uthai hai woh dekh lijiye madam. Pura clear kar diya hai Rajasthan ka pura all Rajasthan. 5000, 5 lakh, 5000 kilometer ka varg vargfal chetrapal, uh, chetrapal hai Rajasthan ka, thik hai? Pure ka kar diya hai madam, isse jyada toh main kya kar sakta hu, bataye aap. Chaliye sir thik hai main aapko leads bhejti hu, main aapko phir chaar paanch din mein aapko connect karungi puchne ke liye aap daily basis pe.

Executive: Thik hai sir. Okay thank you.

Customer: Abhi, abhi daily level pe main pick kar lunga na madam?

Executive: Ji sir, okay. Haan ji. Thank you. Welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not picking up leads daily.

- Customer missed two calls.

- Customer has not received any orders yet.

- Executive wants to close the 'not satisfied' concern.



Resolution:

- Executive shares leads on WhatsApp daily.

- Customer agreed to pick up leads daily.

- Customer will close the concern after getting order.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect in 4-5 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, follow up, customer satisfaction
